pullrequest.title: Fix drc practice launch files, and models and world for task 6

content.raw:
I'm not sure that this is under the scope of this pull request, but anyway ... I'm seeing in task2 the following messages
```
[ INFO] [1380838057.217541915]: Starting robot with BDI standing
[ INFO] [1380838057.217906431]: Can't find <atlas><robot_description> blocks, defaults to [robot_description].
[ INFO] [1380838057.218013688, 0.001000000]: Can't find <atlas><pose> blocks, defaults to zero transform.
```

gazebo is taking lot of time to render the initial image and when this happens, the robot appears fallen on the ground.
content.html:
I'm not sure that this is under the scope of this pull request, but anyway ... I'm seeing in task2 the following messages

[ INFO] [1380838057.217541915]: Starting robot with BDI standing
[ INFO] [1380838057.217906431]: Can't find <atlas><robot_description> blocks, defaults to [robot_description].
[ INFO] [1380838057.218013688, 0.001000000]: Can't find <atlas><pose> blocks, defaults to zero transform.

gazebo is taking lot of time to render the initial image and when this happens, the robot appears fallen on the ground.
